author: JOSH BOAK, FATIMA HUSSEIN and KEN SWEET
title: Biden and Europe waiting on one key sanction against Russia
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — U.S. and European officials are holding one key financial sanction against Russia in reserve, choosing not to boot Russia off SWIFT, the dominant system for global financial transactions.
